attributes.action: Stop giving expensive homes in London rent free to those who don't work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently a Nigerian single mother of 5 was given a million pound house in London and gets her rent of £24,000 paid by the taxpayer plus she gets welfare on top. An Afghan single mum was also given a million pound house in London.  These people could never get a job that paid them what welfare does. Non workers should be re-located from London to Liverpool where rents are cheaper.
